summary: This is a calendar entry for a scheduled call with Jeffrey Epstein on June 13, 2008. The entry notes the caller has a sentencing hearing with Judge Hurley that morning before traveling to Miami and requests to connect with Epstein later that morning or via cell phone.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The calendar entry is for an accepted call with Epstein, referred to as 'Mr.' in the comment.

persons.name: Judge Hurley
persons.context: Mentioned as the judge presiding over the caller's 8:30 AM sentencing hearing on the same day as the scheduled call with Epstein.

connections.description: The document connects Epstein indirectly to Judge Hurley via a caller who has a sentencing before Hurley and is then attempting to schedule a call with Epstein.

events.title: Scheduled call with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A 30-minute call with Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for the afternoon. The caller notes a prior commitment with Judge Hurley and travel to Miami.

events.title: Sentencing hearing before Judge Hurley
events.description: The caller references an 8:30 AM sentencing hearing with Judge Hurley on the same day as the scheduled call with Epstein.

locations: ofc. (office - location of the scheduled call)
keyFacts: A call with Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for June 13, 2008, indicating ongoing communication or coordination during that period.
The caller had a sentencing hearing with Federal Judge Hurley on the same morning, suggesting the caller was involved in legal proceedings.
The caller was traveling to Miami, a location central to Epstein's activities and properties.
The calendar entry was created on May 9, 2006, but modified and stamped for a 2008 event, showing planning or rescheduling.
